description: This file defines a React functional component named TopNav, which serves as the application's top navigation bar. It includes branding, theme toggling, data import, and export options via a menu with buttons for CSV, PNG, and JSON exports.

methods.name: TopNav({ theme, onToggleTheme, onImport, onExportCSV, onExportPNG, onExportJSON })
methods.description: React functional component for the application's top navigation bar, including logo, theme toggle, import, and export menu.

ctags.name: TopNav
ctags.pattern: /^function TopNav({ theme, onToggleTheme, onImport, onExportCSV, onExportPNG, onExportJSON }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ theme, onToggleTheme, onImport, onExportCSV, onExportPNG, onExportJSON })
